message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this incredible product that I think you'll love. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to let it go for $18000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $16000. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000.
Bob, I appreciate your persistence! I'm willing to make another concession. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $15500. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13500.

Bob, I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $14800. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13200.

Bob, I'm not willing to go any lower than this. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $13500. This is my final and best offer. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13000.
